overview: From 2025-09-24 to 2025-09-25, ethereum-optimism/superchain-ops had 3 new PRs (9 merged), 1 new issues, and 20 active contributors.

topIssues.title: clean up json length parsing
topIssues.author: tynes
topIssues.body:
<!--
Need help?
Refer to our contributing guidelines for additional information about making a good issue:
https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/.github/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md
-->

If you are open to enabling `ffi`, it is possible to use `jq` to get the length of a JSON array. It would allow for the removal of this code:
https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/superchain-ops/blob/2b033baf37326630260b870c868f6040635b1ea3/src/JsonTxBuilderBase.sol#L24-L25

There is a lot of usage of `jq` in the monorepo forge scripts.

Also the solidity team has talked about removing `abi.encodePacked` in a future version of solidity, so `string.concat` should be preferred over `string(abi.encodePacked(...))`
https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/superchain-ops/blob/2b033baf37326630260b870c868f6040635b1ea3/src/JsonTxBuilderBase.sol#L33

topIssues.title: Make SignFromJson compatible with Safe Web UI
topIssues.author: zchn
topIssues.body:
Currently, the SignFromJson script always use Multicall3.aggregate3 to generate the transaction to be signed, example: https://dashboard.tenderly.co/k-oplabs/project/simulator/4e4efb85-acfc-4210-9a8d-55785e0b65a1

The safe web UI uses MultiSendCallOnly.multiSend to generate the transaction to be signed if there are multiple calls: https://dashboard.tenderly.co/public/safe/safe-apps/simulator/3be84dfc-96d6-4069-bae6-6f64a6da5dbf, and no multicall at all if there is a single call: https://dashboard.tenderly.co/public/safe/safe-apps/simulator/d2177dce-db8a-4999-8ac0-38d2bebe3fd4

This FR is about changing SignFromJson so it behaves just like safe web UI, so different signers can choose to use either SignFromJson or Safe Web UI and they would still see the same domain hash and message hash.

topIssues.title: Suggestion: improved proposal ops
topIssues.author: pegahcarter
topIssues.body:
<!--
Need help?
Refer to our contributing guidelines for additional information about making a good issue:
https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/.github/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md
-->

I propose using a framework like [forge-proposal-simulator](https://github.com/solidity-labs-io/forge-proposal-simulator) to standardize how proposals are generated.

topIssues.title: Enforce folder numbering
topIssues.author: maurelian
topIssues.body:
We should add a check in CI to ensure that within a task folder, the numbering of tasks is increasing and does not overlap.

ie. #200 currently introduces a new dir `tasks/sep/009-fpac-upgrade` which is incorrect since there is already a `tasks/sep/009-presigned-pause`. 

This happens easily due to race conditions between new tasks, so we should automatically check for it.

topIssues.title: Merge `VerificationBase` into `JsonTxBuilderBase`
topIssues.author: sebastianst
